roleset.name: introduce a geranylgeranyl group into a molecule

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: Hence, we geranylgeranylated RhoA in vitro with recombinant GGTase-I using stoichiometric amounts of both proteins and purified the resulting complex by size exclusion chromatography.

example.name: example with result
example.text: The released K3 is delivered via an unknown transport system to various tissues, where it is geranylgeranylated to form MK-4.
